segments.text: I think the woman is going to regret not paying attention to the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out, and she’s standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her—she’s going to have a huge mess to clean up later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just exhausted or really that distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like it’s a tightrope act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, completely unfazed by the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just heartbreaking in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR
